name: Beedrill
flavorText:
It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and
its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

pokemon.name: Weedle
pokemon.flavorText:
Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

pokemon.name: Kakuna
pokemon.flavorText:
Almost incapable
of moving, this
POKéMON can only harden its shell
to protect itself
from predators.
